Review Case 12AB1212121/100001

! Warning New evidence was received on 5 May 2023 that requires review.

Case Summary

This case involves the theft of valuable items from a retail store in London. The incident occurred on 28 April 2023 at approximately 15:30. The suspect, James Wilson (32), was apprehended shortly after leaving the premises with merchandise valued at approximately Â£450.

The new evidence includes additional CCTV footage showing the suspect's movements prior to entering the store, and a witness statement from a store employee who was previously unavailable for interview.
